me.tatarka.ipromise.task

Interface Task.Sender<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type
    Enclosing interface:
    Task<T>

    public static interface Task.Sender<T>
    Wraps a Deferred so that only messages can be sent. The creator then has control over when the Deferred is closed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
